* can [survive underwater](/wiki/Amphibious "Amphibious").
* is an [animal](/wiki/Animal "Animal").
* can [lay eggs](/wiki/Oviparous "Oviparous").
* [does not eat](/wiki/Inediate "Inediate"). (\*)
* is normally generated [hostile](/wiki/Hostile "Hostile"). |                                                                                                                  |

| **[Reference](/wiki/Source_code "Source code")**                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                               | [SLASH'EM\_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line4406](/wiki/SLASH%27EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line4406 "SLASH'EM 0.0.7E7F2/monst.c") |

The **giant crab** is a monster added in [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"). It is not randomly generated and only appears in the [Sunless Sea](/wiki/Special_level_\(SLASH%27EM\)#The_Sunless_Sea "Special level (SLASH'EM)") special level. By the time you reach them they shouldn't be a threat.

- *This page is a **[stub](/wiki/Category:Stubs "Category:Stubs")**. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by [**expanding this page**.](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Giant_crab\&action=edit)*
html:
Giant crab

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search
; giant crab
Difficulty 9
Attacks Claw 3d6, Claw 3d6
; giant crab
Difficulty 9
Attacks

Claw 3d6, Claw 3d6

Base level 7
Base experience 99
Speed 12
Base AC 0
Base MR 0
Alignment 0 (neutral)
Frequency (by normal means) 0 (Not randomly generated)
Genocidable Yes
Weight 500
Nutritional value 350
Size Huge
Resistances None
Resistances conveyed None

A giant crab:

  • can swim.
  • can survive underwater.
  • is an animal.
  • can lay eggs.
  • does not eat. (*)
  • is normally generated hostile.
Reference SLASH'EM_0.0.7E7F2/monst.c#line4406

The giant crab is a monster added in SLASH'EM. It is not randomly generated and only appears in the Sunless Sea special level. By the time you reach them they shouldn't be a threat.

This page is a stub. Should you wish to do so, you can contribute by expanding this page.
Retrieved from "https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Giant_crab&oldid=103197"

The '''giant crab''' is a monster added in [[SLASH'EM]]. It is not randomly generated and only appears in the [[Special_level_(SLASH'EM)#The_Sunless_Sea|Sunless Sea]] special level.
By the time you reach them they shouldn't be a threat.
